HDG.BC.content: “culture only exists insofar as it is plugged into (eingeschaltet) the operations that secure a basis for a form of domination” [what about Being’s security?] > [Heidegger congratulates himself on use of term from machine technology/utilization, like an automatic proof of actuality that finds words here] [method]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: “culture only exists insofar as it is plugged into (eingeschaltet) the operations that secure a basis for a form of domination” [what about Being’s security?] > [Heidegger congratulates himself on use of term from machine technology/utilization, like an automatic proof of actuality that finds words here] [method]

HDG.OHF.content: self-world & culture not accidental misunderstandings of today, constantly there as analysis travels its proper path (eigentlichen Weg) > hermeneutics must constantly struggle against these 2 possible sidetracks
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: self-world & culture not accidental misunderstandings of today, constantly there as analysis travels its proper path (eigentlichen Weg) > hermeneutics must constantly struggle against these 2 possible sidetracks

HDG.OHF.content: [periodization] historical human sciences view life of culture as objectifications of the subjective (don’t further examine character of being): culture is an organism, autonomous organic life > Spengler took this way of seeing the past the furthest [?], had courage to actualize [further than Nietzsche?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [periodization] historical human sciences view life of culture as objectifications of the subjective (don’t further examine character of being): culture is an organism, autonomous organic life > Spengler took this way of seeing the past the furthest [?], had courage to actualize [further than Nietzsche?]

HDG.OHF.content: [re: historical human sciences] [a pre-critique of Foucault?] each culture interrogated re: expressive being of its formation (Ausdruckseins ihrer Gebilde), on basis of its style, bringing into relief (Abhebung) the Gestaltcharaktere des Gestalthaften: morphology > one culture must be held up against another, method of universally comparing forms (Gestaltvergleichung) (homology, analogy, synchronism, parallelism) > “a closed form-endowed context (Zusammenhang) of forms”: totality of historical past explicated in such a way, a flattening down (Niederschlag) [translator frustratingly prefers word condensation here], can be mastered at a glance (in einem Blick), can order via charts/rubrics [classifying (Ordnung)]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [re: historical human sciences] [a pre-critique of Foucault?] each culture interrogated re: expressive being of its formation (Ausdruckseins ihrer Gebilde), on basis of its style, bringing into relief (Abhebung) the Gestaltcharaktere des Gestalthaften: morphology > one culture must be held up against another, method of universally comparing forms (Gestaltvergleichung) (homology, analogy, synchronism, parallelism) > “a closed form-endowed context (Zusammenhang) of forms”: totality of historical past explicated in such a way, a flattening down (Niederschlag) [translator frustratingly prefers word condensation here], can be mastered at a glance (in einem Blick), can order via charts/rubrics [classifying (Ordnung)]

HDG.OHF.content: “toward the objective,” “Platonism of barbarians” [reference to Republic], objective metaphysics: what kind of being stands in forehaving here? Vorhandensein, Gegenwärtigsein, the present transformation of culture > “Vorhaben, Vorgriff: bestimmen = übersehbar machen” [this final sentence seems to show that there is showing in defining limitations of today]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “toward the objective,” “Platonism of barbarians” [reference to Republic], objective metaphysics: what kind of being stands in forehaving here? Vorhandensein, Gegenwärtigsein, the present transformation of culture > “Vorhaben, Vorgriff: bestimmen = übersehbar machen” [this final sentence seems to show that there is showing in defining limitations of today]

HDG.OHF.content: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]

HDG.OHF.content: philosophy as universal classification (Ordnen), encompasses (umspannt) totality of culture (Gesamtheit der Kultur), the system of cultural systems > this totality not examined as theme in philosophy > temporal itself not investigated, but rather is that from out of which (von dem aus) classifying takes its point of departure (das Ordnen seinen Ausgang nimmt), so to insert it into context of classification > the comporting at point of departure (Ausgangsverhalten) of classifying grasps temporal in advance as types, essential generalities, only in this way can it enter a context of classification, so it doesn’t define or tarry in transitional stage, the one relevant for its actualizing > no one is disturbed by this, they characterize the point of departure as an object (temporal, empirical, mutable, subjective, real, singular, individual), in contrast to trans-temporal, ideal, universal
